title: Chakra Healing Music by Aaditya (9 Albums) [FLAC]
description:
Chakra Healing (Balancing and Tuning)

Each of these ambient healing pieces corresponds to one of your seven Chakras.

But not just in name: Each Chakra has a resonant, corresponding frequency/musical note (or vibration, if you will). The musical key of each of the pieces on this album is tuned to the Chakra of it's namesake to ensure pure alignment and harmony.

At just under ten-minutes each, these healing sounds are perfect not only for a total Chakra alignment, but also for a quick recharge during your stressful and energy draining day.

1.Base / Root Chakra 09:53
2.Sacral Chakra 09:51
3.Solar Plexus Chakra 09:55
4.Heart Chakra 09:55
5.Throat Chakra 09:56
6.Brow / Third-Eye Chakra 09:52
7.Crown Chakra 09:54

Torrent also includes 1 hour long versions of the above 7 chakras.

Form Is Emptiness (Ambient Meditation Music)

These three pieces of music were created to help you abandon your earthly concerns, if only for a short time, through peaceful meditation. Whether you're meditating to clear your mind, focusing on a specific thought or just enjoying some much-needed relaxation, these sounds exist for you to drift away into.

1.Emptiness 15:28
2.Is 15:36
3.Form 25:29
